reviewText:
This game is such a delight! It is really festive and colorful. It also lets you restart levels or replay individual hands (something a lot of solitaire games lack)!

I highly recommend this game for some early Christmas fun! Hope they make another one :)

Runs great on super wide screen monitors and current PC's!
voteText: 12 of 13 people (92%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Lapland Solitaire has very festive Christmas scenes. I honestly believe it is over priced for the lack luster game play and items you earn. If I paid a few dollars I wouldn't mind but for $10. I say it isn't anything special. It can't hold a candle to other solitaire games that I found on steam. I would not recommend it.
voteText: 6 of 10 people (60%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Bland and uninspired. One of the weaker solitaire games available.
voteText: 5 of 10 people (50%) found this review helpful
